pages.text: Money exists on Hexhaven for a simple reason: $(l)to have fun$().$(br2)Outside of shop ownership and your $(t:Universal Basic Income)$(#0000EE)UBI$()$(/t), there are many ways to earn and spend coins!

Here's just a few ways:$(br)$(li)Feed The Heart a golden apple when her lights have gone down$(br)$(li)Facilitate one-on-one trades with other players$(br)$(li)Exchange coins for services like fetch quests and manual labour
$(li)Open a minigame and charge a small fee to play$(br)$(li)Lean into the roleplay aspect and open a donation charity or subscription service$(br)$(li)Start a cult and require a tithe
